post:
[<strong>...</strong>](http://ellipsisno.de/) hosts unmanaged virtual private servers via OVH and Fiberhub. These offers are available at the former location (BHS-1) on a new node.

Xeon E5-1620 processors, RAID 1 HDD, 3 cores (more if you want), <a href="http://www.ovh.com/ca/en/anti-ddos/"><strong>Anti-DDoS mitigation</strong></a>, OpenVZ/SolusVM, TUN/TAP and lots of OS to choose from. Extra IPs are $12 / year. Test IP & files = <a href="http://192.99.214.79/"><strong>192.99.214.79</strong></a>.

It's $3.33 for every plan if you'd prefer to pay monthly. PayPal and BitPay are accepted with a <a href="http://ellipsisno.de/terms/"><strong>7 day money back guarantee</strong></a>. Thanks for your interest.
